description: It's been a while since TommyD has invited more than one person at a time to play with him. Luckily for you, he was feeling extra horny this week. We all know that Tommy is bi, and that Jessie loves the cock, but none of us know too much about Rick...until now. Rick calls himself 'sexual', meaning, he's down for whatever as long as it involves no clothes and getting off, and that's exactly what these three do. Throw in some anal beads, dildo and a whole bunch of lube, and you've got one hell of a good time on your hands. Enjoy!
title: Tommy D Sexy Trio
